section.p: You climb down an old disused well in the poor quarter of Yellowport.

If you have the codeword Acid or a copper amulet, immediately.
If not, read on.

It is dank, dark and smelly down below.
If you do not have a light source, such as a lantern or a torch, you will have to return to the city - .
If you are a Mage you can use sorcery to create light. If you have a light source, read on.

p.if: You follow a tunnel into the darkness. .
